reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 293/16: COUNCIL COMPOSITION - REGIONAL MUNICIPALITY OF DURHAM
reg_info.reg_name_text: COUNCIL COMPOSITION - REGIONAL MUNICIPALITY OF DURHAM

content.content: 1. The Regional Municipality of Durham may exercise its power under section 218 of the Act to change the composition of its council by, (a) increasing the number of members from the Town of Ajax from three to four; (b) increasing the number of members from the Town of Whitby from four to five; and (c) decreasing the number of members from the City of Oshawa from eight to six.
content.raw_html:
1. The Regional Municipality of Durham may exercise its power under section 218 of the Act to change the composition of its council by,

(a) increasing the number of members from the Town of Ajax from three to four;

(b) increasing the number of members from the Town of Whitby from four to five; and

(c) decreasing the number of members from the City of Oshawa from eight to six.

content.content:
2. Omitted
(provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation).   Français
content.raw_html:
2. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation).
